education.title: University of Michigan - Stephen M. Ross School of Business

recommendations: Elizabeth Wolfe-Brusher ‚ÄúThroughout our 4-month Multidisciplinary Action Project at the Ross School of Business, Sachin consistently displayed business skills and personal characteristics that made him a tremendous asset to our team. His natural entrepreneurial and strategic mindset together with his strong financial modeling skills proved extremely valuable during the course of our project. Additionally, Sachin is reliable, follows through on his commitments and is a pleasure with whom to work.‚Äù

Neil Garbacik ‚ÄúThere are certain individuals through your life and career who make an impact on you, which make your work experience more enjoyable or help you develop professionally and personally who you never forget. Working with Sachin was a privilege. At the time he was a key member of my project team where we relied on him to conduct negotiations with the customer and effectively manage the application side of the product development to help produce a flawless product launch. Sachin has developed excellent management and negotiation skills as well as problem solving skills. He is a high energy and motivating example of a true entrepreneur with his endeavors. Sachin's multitasking ability and work ethic is absolutely incredible. He is very reliable, never gives up and has a excellent personality. Overall, Sachin is a person who I would not hesitate to recommend from a professional perspective.‚Äù
